      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - the argument array passed to the program. Parameters can be passed in any order. Program call: java SeatReservation.java [parameter] [sequence number of seats to reserve] Parameters: -sizeX Number of chairs in a row -sizeY The number of chairs in the column -spaceX Number of vacant chairs in a row as a space between reserved ones -spaceY Number of free chairs in the column as a space between reserved ones -mode UI Mode 1 = console, 2 = dialog graphic default dialog graphic
